title: The Snails = Les Escargots
creator_credit: Societe des Films d'Art et de Culture
brief_description: Animated science fiction fantasy about man’s inability to learn from his mistakes. Depicts a peasant who discovers that his tears will make his crops grow, but snails appear, consume the crops and become monstrous creatures. Suitable for upper primary and lower secondary levels.
